agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations TIME & DATE: 7:30 AM, Tuesday, January 29, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. John Zerwas The House Appropriations Committee will meet to hear testimony on the following: · Sunset Recommendations Affecting the Budget · Audits Affecting the Budget · State Contracting · Employee Retirement System · Teacher Retirement System · Cybersecurity and IT · Deferred Maintenance and Capital Needs · Other budget matters The committee will hear invited testimony only. Agenda items not considered during this meeting may be carried over to a future meeting. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
